sentences.en: Nuptial love maketh mankind ; friendly love perfectith it, but wanton love corrupteth and embaseth it.
sentences.cn: 男女之爱使人类得以延续;友爱使人类走向完美; 但放纵的爱败坏人类并使其变得卑贱.
